lead_paragraph: FELSEN--Esther and David. Missed, loved and remembered always by the Felsen, Sokol and Rivard families, including our most recent additions, Micah Felsen and Nat and Leo Felsen. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  FELSEN, ESTHER AND DAVID

snippet: FELSEN--Esther and David. Missed, loved and remembered always by the Felsen, Sokol and Rivard families, including our most recent additions, Micah Felsen and Nat and Leo Felsen. 1/3
